name: HAELE 3D - Feet Poser Lite
description:
The Lite version of HAELE is a versatile 3D feet poser and customizer app, with features essential for drawing feet. It is an easy to use foot anatomy reference tool for the artist, with a wide palette of detailed options and poses to create highly realistic feet and edit its environment.









Features:

  • Preset poses
  • Editable lights: Point light (color, intensity transformation), Environment light (HDRI map, intensity), Ground light (color, intensity)
  • Environment: HDRI studio backgrounds, Solid colors,
  • Floor on/off, color, reflectivity
  • Skin material: editable details, reflectivity, tone saturation, variation
  • Colors: preset skin colors, grayscale and skin tones,
  • Nails: shine, tone
  • Adjustable camera angle, location, position and field of view
  • Save and load scenes
  • Load presets


Click to open sheets!
